DOC.brief_title: Levofloxacin-containing Therapies In Second Line Helicobacter Pylori Eradication
DOC.detailed_description: In randomized-controlled trial , investigator recruit participant H pylori infection failure first line standard triple therapy . Using computer-generated randomization sequence , investigator randomly allocate patient either 10-day levofloxacin-containing sequential ( EALM , esomeprazole 40 mg b.d. , amoxicillin 1 g b.d.for 5 day follow esomeprazole 40 mg b.d. , levofloxacin 500 mg qd metronidazole 5 day ) 10-day levofloxacin-containing triple therapy ( EAL , esomeprazole 40 mg b.d. , amoxicillin 1 g b.d. , levofloxacin 500 mg qd ) 1:1 ratio . The primary outcome eradication rate intention-to-treat per-protocol analysis .
